name: Realm of the Strange 300%
description: During the event, successfully challenge Caverns of Corrosion to earn triple rewards.
introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
During the event, Trailblazers can receive triple rewards by challenging and completing Caverns of Corrosion.
You will get TWO additional rewards on top of default drops after consuming an event triple reward opportunity and Trailblaze Power.
The number of triple reward opportunities during the event is limited. The limits and attempts used so far can be viewed on the Realm of the Strange 300% event page.
The triple reward count will not reset during the event. Be sure to schedule your time for this challenge accordingly, Trailblazers.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
By completing Caverns of Corrosion and obtaining rewards, Trailblazers will automatically consume one remaining chance to receive triple rewards.
